overview: Aydos forest, 2 dead on the back. In the situation where the body was found, Ecrin Ayçiçek is the personality of a young girl. The only evidence at hand is this identity card. Our team will go after Ecrin to search. A little surprise awaits. What kind of relationship is there between the unknown corpse and Ecrin? As Baris, Hakan and Zeynep deepen the investigation, they get sick, unexpectedly.
title: Circle: The Girl at the End of the Road
